SVGAngle.summary: The SVGAngle interface is used to represent a value that can be an {{cssxref("<angle>")}} or {{cssxref("<number>")}} value.

remarks.para: The SVGAngle returned from and is read only, but the SVGAngle returned from is writable. When designated as read only, attempts to modify the object will result in an exception being thrown.

An SVGAngle object can be associated with a particular element. The associated element is used to determine which element's content attribute to update if the object reflects an attribute. Unless otherwise described, an SVGAngle object is not associated with any element.
Every SVGAngle object operates in one of two modes:

SVGAngleConvertToSpecifiedUnits.summary: The convertToSpecifiedUnits() method of the interface allows you to convert the angle's value to the specified unit type.

SVGAngleValue.summary: The value property of the interface represents the floating point value of the <angle> in degrees.

remarks.para: Setting this attribute will cause and to be updated automatically to reflect this setting.

SVGAngleValue.value: A number; the angle value in degrees.

SVGAngleUnitType.summary: The unitType property of the interface is one of the unit type constants and represents the units in which this angle's value is expressed.
SVGAngleUnitType.value: A number representing the numeric value of the constant.

SVGAngleValueInSpecifiedUnits.summary: The valueInSpecifiedUnits property of the interface represents the value of this angle as a number, in the units expressed by the angle's .

remarks.para: Setting this attribute will cause and to be updated automatically to reflect this setting.

SVGAngleValueInSpecifiedUnits.value: A number; the numeric factor of the angle.

SVGAngleNewValueSpecifiedUnits.summary: The newValueSpecifiedUnits() method of the interface sets the value to a number with an associated , thereby replacing the values for all of the attributes on the object.

SVGAngleValueAsString.summary: The valueAsString property of the interface represents the angle's value as a string, in the units expressed by .

remarks.para: Setting this attribute will cause , , and to be updated automatically to reflect this setting.

SVGAngleValueAsString.value: A string; the value of the angle.
